sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'; import './Catalog.css'; import { Button, Card, Col, Container, Modal, Row } from "react-bootstrap"; function Catalog(){ const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const ArraysOfCollection = [{ id: 1, image: '', title: 'Hello world', text: 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit, amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Aliquam, iusto consequuntur eos voluptatem laboriosam esse? Quaerat vel sunt natus possimus?', name: 'Шары воздушные', cost: 2999 }]; const ArraysOfCollectionOnMap = ArraysOfCollection.map((ArrayOfCollection) => <> {ArrayOfCollection.title} {ArrayOfCollection.text}

{ArrayOfCollection.name}

{ArrayOfCollection.cost}тг
 {ArrayOfCollection.title} {ArrayOfCollection.text} ) return(

Каталог Шаров

{ArraysOfCollectionOnMap} ) } export default Catalog;
